title: Digital Transformation at Financial Institutions
description:
The objective of this module is to provide a technological
overview of the business functions of modern banking, 
insurance, and investment sectors. Students will learn how 
FinTech is transforming the business operations in these 
financial firms. Particularly, this module covers smart credit 
analytics, RegTech, InsurTech, AI and banking, and other new 
topics of FinTech at large financial institutions. This module 
also serves the purpose to teach students about the basics of 
banking and insurance.
